content: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
God doesn’t require us to succeed, he only requires that you try.
Live simply so others may simply live.
Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
There are many people who can do big things, but there are very few people who will do the small things.
The trees, the flowers, the plants grow in silence. The stars, the sun, the moon move in silence. Silence gives us a new perspective.
Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
When you don’t have anything, then you have everything.
